data.actual_result: The string is converted to a mention, and tapping on the mention takes you to the private DM of that user after exiting the edit roles screen.
data.expected_result: The string should not be a mention.
data.short_description: Naming a role with a snowflake converts it into a mention on delete screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Name a role with a valid snowflake ID (`<@number>`). - Delete the role. - Tap on the mention.
